english.segment1: You are beauty. Oh, how beautiful You are. Shining like a treasure
english.segment2: You are brilliant. And You overwhelm the stars. Glory without mesure
english.segment3: Glorious One, Glorious One. Merciful Father. Beautiful Son
english.segment4: Glorious One, Glorious One. You are my pleasure, You are my song. Oh Glorious One
english.segment5: You are mercy, and Your mercy is Your crown. Infinite and ageless
english.segment6: You are forever, and forever You will be. Worthy of all praises
english.segment7: God Your fame is great. It cannot be contained. Your name is praised. Above all other names
